description: B.R.P.M.A. Devendra Vs Director General of Human Resources and Mission Management of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Another before Hon.Dr. D. F. H. Gunawardhana, J.
parties: B.R.P.M.A. Devendra Vs Director General of Human Resources and Mission Management of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Another
judgement_by: Hon.Dr. D. F. H. Gunawardhana, J.
keywords: An administrative officer in the cadre of Sri Lanka Administrative Service secured a diplomatic appointment on a contractual basis without being absorbed or recruited into the diplomatic service. When recalled concluding his Tour of Duty, it was held that he is only entitled to obtain relief on the contract, not otherwise.
legistation: The Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
